Baba and Devil(aka devilal) are playing a game, Baba has given Devil an array of N numbers and a limit K.

baba tells the devil to count the numbers in array, those have value strictly greater than K.
Help the devil. 

Input

First line of input contains an integer T denoting the no. of test cases, the description of T test case follows.
First line of each test case contains two integers N and K denoting the size of array and limit respectively.
Second line of each test case contains N space separated integers A1, A2, ..., AN denoting the elements in array. 


Output

For each test case ouput the single line containing the answer.


Constraints

1 ≤ T ≤ 10
1 ≤ N,K,Ai ≤ 10^5


Example
Input:
2
5 3
1 2 3 4 5
6 4
7 8 9 10 7 5

Output:
2
6


Explanation
In Example case 1.  4 and 5 are greater than 3. So, answer is 2.
